last_episode_to_air.name: Holding On Four Dear Life!
last_episode_to_air.overview: THIS IS IT! With few left, the stakes are higher than ever before! A merciless Trevor throws in some radical curveballs as fatigue escalates to delirium. With the clock ticking down, a daunting announcement compels the brave to pull out all the stops and strike with comedic blows. Who can possibly survive this relentless onslaught and be crowned the winner of LOL: Last One Laughing South Africa?

name: LOL: Last One Laughing South Africa
original_name: LOL: Last One Laughing South Africa
overview: Ten well-known South African comedians and performers compete to discover who can maintain composure while simultaneously trying to make their opponents laugh and lose.

episodes.name: Comedians Versus Civilians
episodes.overview: Nerves, anxiety and pressure runs amok as our 10 contenders are revealed, as is our host Trevor Noah. Alliances and strategy take center stage as the comedians in the room plot to oust the ‘people people’ amongst them. Whilst toilet humour, twerking, the National Anthem and a pregnant cast member all battle for the spotlight - a warning shot is fired as the first yellow card is shown.

episodes.name: Of Bad Magic and Twerks
episodes.overview: The game is now in full swing and the yellow cards begin flowing. Everyone quickly realises the ruthlessness of their new situation; break each other or get broken! Alliances begin to form, underhanded plots start bubbling and more than one brash attempt gets unleashed.

episodes.name: Things Are Getting 'Wors'
episodes.overview: Nerves set in after the first red card of the season as people begin to take the game more seriously. Whilst some are anxious to finally try out their gags before being eliminated, others opt to take a more casual approach to getting laughs. Boerewors is an omnipresent element in the kitchen, on plates and in gags.

episodes.name: The Atchar Puppet
episodes.overview: Red lights and red cards become more frequent as big performances take us deeper into the game. Powerful onslaughts come from a Kung fu master, while a questionable director presents their skewed vision. But it’s a surprise visit from a DIY specialist that pushes the repressed giggles to the brink…Meanwhile our host ups the ante with a mischievous phone call that sends his victim into a pickle.

episodes.name: You’ll Never Break Me
episodes.overview: While Trevor Noah’s puppet master antics tip the house into chaos, we are treated to an actual puppet show by a surprise guest. Levels of reality begin blurring as the fifth hour puts its foot down while sending more than one contestant headfirst down the rabbit hole.

episodes.name: Holding On Four Dear Life!
episodes.overview: THIS IS IT! With few left, the stakes are higher than ever before! A merciless Trevor throws in some radical curveballs as fatigue escalates to delirium. With the clock ticking down, a daunting announcement compels the brave to pull out all the stops and strike with comedic blows. Who can possibly survive this relentless onslaught and be crowned the winner of LOL: Last One Laughing South Africa?
